org.openwms.common.location

Interface LocationService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LocationServiceImpl

    public interface LocationService
    A LocationService offers useful methods according to the handling of Locations.
    Author:
    Heiko Scherrer

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void changeState(String pKey, ErrorCodeVO errorCode)
      Change the infeed and outfeed state of a Location in respect of the according LocationGroup.
      List<Location> findAllOf(List<String> locationGroupName)
      Find and return all Locations that belong to a LocationGroup with the name locationGroupName.
      Optional<Location> findByLocationId(LocationPK locationPK)
      Find and return a Location identified by the given locationPK.
      Optional<Location> findByLocationId(String locationPK)
      Find and return a Location identified by the given locationPK.
      Optional<Location> findByPlcCode(String plcCode)
      Find and return a Location by the given plcCode.
      List<Location> findLocations(LocationPK locationPK)
      Find and return all Locations that match the locationPK whereas the attributes of the LocationPK may include SQL wildcard operators, like '%', '_'.
      Location removeMessages(String pKey, List<Message> messages)
      Removes a list of Messages from a Location.

    • Method Detail

      • removeMessages

        Location removeMessages(String pKey,
                        List<Message> messages)
        Removes a list of Messages from a Location.
        Parameters:
        pKey - The persistent key identifier of the Location
        messages - The messages to be removed
        Returns:
        The updated Location

      • findByLocationId

        Optional<Location> findByLocationId(LocationPK locationPK)
        Find and return a Location identified by the given locationPK.
        Parameters:
        locationPK - The business key of the Location to search for
        Returns:
        The Location

      • findByLocationId

        Optional<Location> findByLocationId(String locationPK)
        Find and return a Location identified by the given locationPK.
        Parameters:
        locationPK - The business key as String of the Location to search for
        Returns:
        The Location

      • findLocations

        List<Location> findLocations(LocationPK locationPK)
        Find and return all Locations that match the locationPK whereas the attributes of the LocationPK may include SQL wildcard operators, like '%', '_'.
        Parameters:
        locationPK - The LocationPK
        Returns:
        All Locations or an empty list, never null

      • findByPlcCode

        Optional<Location> findByPlcCode(String plcCode)
        Find and return a Location by the given plcCode.
        Parameters:
        plcCode - The PLC Code
        Returns:
        The Location

      • findAllOf

        List<Location> findAllOf(List<String> locationGroupName)
        Find and return all Locations that belong to a LocationGroup with the name locationGroupName.
        Parameters:
        locationGroupName - The name of the LocationGroup
        Returns:
        All LocationGroups or an empty list, never null

      • changeState

        void changeState(String pKey,
                 ErrorCodeVO errorCode)
        Change the infeed and outfeed state of a Location in respect of the according LocationGroup.
        Parameters:
        pKey - The persistent key identifier of the Location to change
        errorCode - Contains the error bitmap to encode the state
